message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split, considering that you lose more value than me with each round. This way we both get a good amount right away without risking depreciation.
Given the inflation rates, I believe this split is more balanced and fair for both of us. Let's settle this round to maximize our gains.
Let's meet in the middle at 55-45. With inflation affecting you more severely (20% vs my 10%), further delays will hurt both of us, but you more significantly. This is a balanced compromise.
